entry.title: 缩略语 、术语表
entry.content:
缩略语 英文 中文
ACL Access Control List 访问控制列表
AF Assured Forwarding 确保转发
AGCF Access Gateway Control Function 接入网关控制功能
AMBR Aggregate Maximum Bit Rate 集合最大比特速率
AMR Adaptive Multirate 自适应多速率
AMR-WB Adaptive Multi-Rate-Wideband 宽带自适应多速率
APN Access Point Name 接入点名称
APN-AMBR APN Aggregate Maximum Bit Rate 集合最大比特速率
ARP Allocation/Retention Priority 分配保留优先级
ARP Address Resolution Protocol 地址解析协议
AS Application Server 应用服务器
A-SBC Access Session Border Controller 接入会话边界控制器
ASCII American Standard Code for Information Interchange 美国信息交换标准代码
ATCF Access Transfer Control Function 接入转发控制功能
ATGW Access Transfer Gateway 接入转发网关
AUTN Authentication Token 认证令牌
AV Authorization Vector 认证向量AV
AVP Attribute-Value Pair 属性值对
B2BUA Back-to-Back User Agent 背靠背用户代理
BAIC Barring of All Incoming Calls 闭锁所有入呼叫
BAOC Barring of All Outgoing Calls 锁所有出呼叫
BCSM Basic Call State Model 基本呼叫状态模型
BE Best-Effort 尽力而为业务
BFD Bidirectional Forwarding Detection 双向转发检测
BGCF Breakout Gateway Control Function 出口网关控制功能
BICC Bearer Independent Call Control 与承载无关的呼叫控制协议
BIC-ROAM Barring of Incoming Calls When Roaming Outside Home PLMN Country 漫游出归属国家时闭锁所有入呼
BOIC Barring of All Outgoing International Calls 禁止国际出局呼叫
BOIC-exHC Barring of Outgoing International Calls except those directed to the Home PLMN Country 闭锁除归属PLMN国家外所有国际出呼叫
BSS Business Support System 业务支撑系统
CAMEL Customized Applications for Mobile network Enhanced Logic 移动网增强逻辑的用户应用
CAP Customized Applications for Mobile network Enhanced Logic Application Part CAME应用部分
C-BGF Core Border Gateway Function 核心边界网关功能
CCF Charging Collection Function 计费收集功能
CCR Credit Control Request 信用控制请求
CDR Charging Data Record 详细计费话单
CFNR Call Forwarding on No Reply 无应答呼叫前转
CFNRc Call Forwarding on User Not Reachable 不可及前转
CFU Call Forwarding Unconditional 无条件前转
CH Call Hold 呼叫保持
CIC Carrier Identification Code 电路识别码
CK Ciphering Key 加密密钥
CLIR Calling Line Identification Restriction 主叫线识别限制
C-MSISDN Correlation Mobile Station international ISDN number 相关性终端标示号码
CN Core Network 核心网
COLP Connected Line Identification Presentation 被叫线识别显示
CORBA Common Object Request Broker Architecture 公共对象请求代理结构
CPE Customer Premise Equipment 客户前置设备/用户驻地设备
CS Circuit Switched 电路交换
CSCF Call Session Control Function 呼叫会话控制功能
CSFB Circuit Switched Fallback 电路域回落语音解决方案
CSI CAMEL Subscription Information CAMEL签约信息
CW Call Waiting 呼叫等待
DHCP Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol 动态主机配置协议
Diameter IETF（Internet Engineering Task Force）Authentication、Authorization、Accounting protol 一种AAA协议
DL TFT DownLink Traffic Flow Template 下行链路业务流模板
DMS Device Manager System 设备管理服务器
DNS Domain Name System 域名系统
DP Detection Point 检出点
DRA Diameter Router Agent Diameter 路由代理
DTD Document Type Definition 文档类型定义
Dual Radio Dual Radio mode 单终端单卡双模双待
ECF Event Charging Function 事件计费功能
ECM EPS Connection Management EPS连接管理
E-CSCF Emergency-Call Session Control Function 紧急-呼叫会话控制功能
ECT Explicit Call Transfer 显式呼叫转移
EF Expedited Forwarding 加速转发
EMS Enhanced Messaging Service 增强型短消息业务
ENS Enhanced Name Server 增强名字服务器
EPC Evolved Packet Core 演进型分组核心网
EPS Evolved Packet System 演进的分组系统
eSRVCC enhanced SRVCC 增强单待语音连续
E-STN-SR Emergency Session Transfer Number for Single Radio 用于SRVCC的紧急会话转换号码
ETSI European Telecommunications Standards Institute 欧洲电信标准协会
E-UTRAN Evolved Universal Terrestrial Radio Access Network 演进型通用陆地无线接入网
FMC Fixed Mobile Convergence 固定网络与移动网络融合
FQDN Fully Qualified Domain Name 全资格域名
GAA Generic Authentication Architecture 通用认证架构
GBR Guaranteed Bit Rate 保证比特速率
GCID GPRS Charging Identifier GPRS 计费标识
GERAN GSM EDGE Radio Access Network GSM/EDGE无线接入网
GGSN Gateway GPRS Support Node 网关 GPRS 支持节点
GMLC Gateway Mobile Location Center 网关移动定位中心
GMSC Gateway Mobile Switching Center 关口移动交换中心
GPRS General Packet Radio Service 通用分组无线业务
GTP GPRS Tunneling Protocol GPRS遂道协议
GTP-C GPRS Tunneling Protocol-Control plane GPRS隧道协议控制面
GTP-U GPRS Tunneling Protocol-User plane GPRS隧道协议用户面
H.248 ITU-T H.248/IETF MeGaCo Protocol 一种媒体网关控制协议
HLR Home Location Register 归属位置寄存器
HRPD High Rate Packet Data 高速包数据网络
HSS Home Subscriber Server 归属用户服务器
HTTP Hypertext Transfer Protocol 超文本传输协议
HTTPS HyperText Transfer Protocol Secure 加密的超文本传输协议
I-BGF Interconnection Border Gateway Function 互通边界网关功能
ICID IMS Charging Identifier IMS计费标识符
ICS IMS Centralized Services IMS集中服务
I-CSCF Interrogating-Call Session Control Function 查询-呼叫会话控制功能
IETF Internet Engineering Task Force Internet 工程任务组
iFC Initial Filter Criteria 初始过滤准则
iGWB iGateWay Bill 计费网关
IK Integrity Key 完整性密钥
IM IP Multimedia IP 多媒体
IM-MGW IP multimedia media gateway IP多媒体网关
IMPI IP Multimedia Private Identity IP多媒体私有标识
IMPU IP multimedia public identity IP多媒体公共标识
IMRN IMS Routing Number IMS路由号码
IMS IP Multimedia Subsystem IP多媒体子系统
IMS-ALG IMS Application Level Gateway IMS 应用层网关
IMSI International Mobile Subscriber Identifier 国际移动用户标识
IM-SSF IP multimedia service switching function IP多媒体业务交换功能
INAP Intelligent Network Application Protocol 智能网应用规程
INVITE INVITE INVITE消息
IOI Inter Operator Identifier 内部运营商标识
IP-CAN IP-Connectivity Access Network IP- 连通性接入网络
Ipsec IP security IP 安全
IRS Implicitly Registered Set 隐式注册集
I-SBC Interconnection Session Border Controller 互通会话边界控制器
ISC IP multimedia Subsystem Service Control IMS 业务控制
ISIM IMS SIM IMS 用户标识模块
ISUP ISDN User Part ISDN（Integrated Services Digital Network）用户部分
ITU-T International Telecommunication Union-Telecommunication Standardization Sector 国际电联电信标准化部门
IVR Interactive Voice Response 交互式语音应答
LRF Location Retrieval Function 位置登记功能
LTE Long Term Evolution 长期演进
LTE-A LTE-Advanced LTE进化
MAC Message Authentication Code 消息验证码
mAGCF Mobile Access Gateway Control Function 移动接入网关控制功能
MAP Mobile Application Part 移动应用部分
MAR Multimedia Authorization Request 多媒体授权请求
MBR Maximum Bit Rate 最大比特速率
MCC Mobile Country Code 移动国家码
MGCF Media Gateway Control Function 媒体网关控制功能
MGCP Media Gateway Control Protocol 媒体网关控制协议
MGW Media Gateway 媒体网关
MME Mobility Management Entity 移动性管理实体
MML Man-Machine Language 人机语言
MMTel AS Multimedia Telephony Application Server MMTel应用服务器
MNC Mobile Network Code 移动网码
MNO Mobile Network Operator 移动网络运营商
MOCN Multi-Operator Core Network 多运营商共享网络
MPS Multimedia Priority Service 多媒体优先级业务
MPTY Multiparty service 多方通话
MRFC Multimedia Resource Function Controller 多媒体资源功能控制器
MRFP Multimedia Resource Function Processor 多媒体资源功能处理器
MSC Mobile Switching Center 移动交换中心
MSISDN Mobile Station International ISDN number 移动台国际ISDN号码
MSRN Mobile Station Roaming Number 移动台漫游号码
MVNE Mobile Virtual Network Enabler 移动虚拟网络提供商
MVNO Mobile Virtual Network Operator 移动虚拟网络运营商
NAI Net work Access Identifier 网络接入标识
NAPTR Naming Authority Pointer 名称权威指针
N-CSI Network Service CAMEL Subscription Information 网络CAMEL签约信息
NEBS Network Equipment Building System 网络设备建构系统
NP Number Portability 号码携带
OCS Online Charging System 在线计费系统
O-CSI Originating CAMEL Subscription Information 始发CAMEL签约信息
OMA Open Mobile Architecture 开放移动联盟
OMA DS OMA Data Synchronization OMA数据同步
OMA IM OMA Instant Message OMA即时消息
OMU Operation and Maintenance Unit 操作维护单元
OSS Operating Support System 运营支撑系统
OSTA Open Standards Telecom Architecture 开放标准电信架构
OTT Over The Top 是指使用诸如Skype等的语音软件
PCC Policy and Charging Control 策略与计费控制
PCM Pulse Code Modulation 脉冲编码调制
PCRF Policy and Charging Rules Function 策略和计费规则功能
P-CSCF Proxy-Call Session Control Function 代理-呼叫会话控制功能
PDN Packet Data Network 分组数据网
PDP Packet Data Protocol 分组数据协议
PDU Protocol Data Unit 协议数据单元
P-GW PDN GateWay PDN网关
PISI PrIvate Service Identity 私有业务标识
PLMN Public Land Mobile Network 公用陆地移动（通信）网
PNA Push Notification Answer 通知响应
PNR Push Notification Request 通知请求
PS Packet Switched 分组交换
PSAP Public Safety Answering Point 紧急呼叫中心
PSI Public Service Identity 公共业务标识
PSTN Public Switched Telephone Network 公共交换电话网
PUSI PUblic Service Identity 公有业务标识
QCI QoS Class Identifier QoS分类识别码
QoS Quality of Service 服务质量
RA Routing Area 路由区
RAND Random challenge 随机挑战询问
RES RESponse 响应
RTCP Real-time Transport Control Protocol 实时传输控制协议
RTP Real-time Transport Protocol 实时传输协议
SAE System Architecture Evolution 系统架构演进
SAI Send Authentication Information 服务区标识
SAR Server Assignment Request 服务器分配请求
SBC Session Border Controller 会话边界控制器
SCP Service Control Point 业务控制点
S-CSCF Serving-Call Session Control Function 服务类型的会话控制功能
SCTP Stream Control Transmission Protocol 流控制传输协议
SDP Session Description Protocol 会话描述协议
SGsAP SGs Application Protocol SGs应用协议
SGSN Serving GPRS Support Node GPRS业务支撑节点
SGW/S-GW Serving GateWay 服务网关
Single Radio Single Radio mode 单终端单卡双模单待
SIP Session Initiation Protocol 会话发起协议
SLF Subscription Locator Function 签约 定位 功能
SMS Short Message Service 短消息业务
SMSC Short Message Service Center 短消息业务中心
SNMP Simple Network Management Protocol 简单网络管理协议
SOAP Simple Object Access Protocol 简单对象访问协议
SPG Service Provisioning Gateway 业务发放网关
SQN Sequence Number 序号
SRVCC Single Radio Voice Call Continuity 单待语音连续
SVLTE Simultaneous Voice and LTE 也称为Dual Radio终端
TA Tracking Area 跟踪区
TAS transmit antenna switch 传输天线开关
TAU Tracking Area Update 跟踪区更新
T-CSI Terminating CAMEL Subscription Information 终止CAMEL签约信息
TFO Tandem Free Operation 免二次编解码操作
TISPAN Telecommunications and Internet converged Services and Protocols for Advanced Networking 电信和互联网融合业务与协议
TrFO Transcoder Free Operation 免码变换操作
UA User Agent 用户代理
UAC User Agent Client 用户代理客户端
UAS User Agent Server 用户代理服务器
UDR User Data Request 按用户的规定选路
UE User Equipment 用户设备
UE-AMBR per UE Aggregate Maximum Bit Rate 每个UE聚合最大比特率
UICC Universal Integrated Circuit Card 通用集成电路卡
UL TFT UpLink Traffic Flow Template 上行链路业务流模板
UPCC Unified Policy and Charging Controller 统一策略和计费控制系统
URI Uniform Resource Identifier 统一资源标识
URL Uniform Resource Locator 统一资源定位
USCDB Unified Subscriber Center Database 统一用户数据中心数据库
USIM Universal Subscriber Identity Module 通用用户标识模块
USSD Unstructured Supplementary Service Data 结构化补充业务数据
UTRAN Universal Terrestrial Radio Access Network UMTS陆地无线接入网
VIG Video Interworking Gateway 视频互通网关
VLAN Virtual Local Area Network 虚拟局域网
VMSC Visited Mobile Switching Center 受访的移动交换中心
VoBB Voice over Broadband 宽带语音业务
VOLTE Voice over Long-Term Evolution 长期演进语音承载
VPN Virtual Private Network 虚拟专用网
VRRP Virtual Router Redundancy Protocol 虚拟路由冗余协议
Web Portal Web Portal 入口站点
WSDL Web Service Description Language Web业务描述语言
XMAC expected MAC 期望的 MAC
XML eXtensible Markup Language 扩展标记语言
XRES Expected Response 期望响应

entry.title: git@github.com: Permission denied (publickey).
entry.content:
ssh -T git@github.com

git config --global user.name "usernme"
git config --global user.email "emailName"

Quick setup

Get started by creating a new file or uploading an existing file. We recommend every repository include a README, LICENSE, and .gitignore.

…or create a new repository on the command line

echo "# whatever you write" >> README.md
git init
git add README.md
git commit -m "first commit"
git branch -M main
git remote add origin https://github.com/***/***.git
git push -u origin main

…or push an existing repository from the command line

git remote add origin https://github.com/***/***.git
git branch -M main
git push -u origin main

…or import code from another repository
You can initialize this repository with code from a Subversion, Mercurial, or TFS project.
import https://github.com/username/repo/import

ssh -v git@github.com

debug1: SSH2_MSG_SERVICE_ACCEPT received
debug1: Authentications that can continue: publickey
debug1: Next authentication method: publickey
debug1: Trying private key: /home/Tree/.ssh/id_rsa
debug1: Authentications that can continue: publickey
debug1: Trying private key: /home/Tree/.ssh/id_dsa
debug1: Trying private key: /home/Tree/.ssh/id_ecdsa
debug1: Trying private key: /home/Tree/.ssh/id_ecdsa_sk
debug1: Trying private key: /home/Tree/.ssh/id_ed25519
debug1: Trying private key: /home/Tree/.ssh/id_ed25519_sk
debug1: Trying private key: /home/Tree/.ssh/id_xmss
debug1: No more authentication methods to try.
git@github.com: Permission denied (publickey).

解决办法：
1、修改私钥名称为默认：id_rsa
2、指定私钥名称
vim ~/.ssh/config

 Host github.com
 HostName github.com
 IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_rsa_github
 User git

entry.title: pcman -Syu 升级失败
entry.content:
msys2 failed retrieving file 'mingw64.db
msys2 failed retrieving file 'mingw32.db
无效或已损坏的数据库 (PGP 签名)

解决方法:
pacman -U http://repo.msys2.org/msys/x86_64/msys2-keyring-1~20210213-1-any.pkg.tar.zst

$ pacman -U http://repo.msys2.org/msys/x86_64/msys2-keyring-1~20210213-1-any.pkg.tar.zst

entry.title: 在授权gitalk后出现403错误
entry.content:
gitalk Error: Request failed with status code 403 network error

编辑scripts.ejs，增加proxy。
路径：安装目录\Gridea\themes\主题名称\templates\includes\scripts.ejs

    <script>
      var gitalk = new Gitalk({
        clientID: '<%= commentSetting.gitalkSetting.clientId %>',
        clientSecret: '<%= commentSetting.gitalkSetting.clientSecret %>',
        repo: '<%= commentSetting.gitalkSetting.repository %>',
        owner: '<%= commentSetting.gitalkSetting.owner %>',
        admin: ['<%= commentSetting.gitalkSetting.owner %>'],
        proxy: 'https://netnr-proxy.cloudno.de/https://github.com/login/oauth/access_token', 
        id: (location.pathname).substring(0, 49),      // Ensure uniqueness and length less than 50
        distractionFreeMode: false  // Facebook-like distraction free mode
      })

      gitalk.render('gitalk-container')

    </script>

proxy自建：https://github.com/Zibri/cloudflare-cors-anywhere

参考：
https://github.com/gitalk/gitalk/issues/429

entry.title: eclipse 官方中文语言包安装步骤
entry.content:
步骤一、下载

下载链接 https://www.eclipse.org/babel/downloads.php

Language: Chinese (Simplified)
BabelLanguagePack-datatools-zh_4.18.0.v20201226020001.zip (75.88%)
BabelLanguagePack-eclipse-zh_4.18.0.v20201226020001.zip (83.92%)
BabelLanguagePack-modeling.emf-zh_4.18.0.v20201226020001.zip (58.66%)
BabelLanguagePack-modeling.mdt.bpmn2-zh_4.18.0.v20201226020001.zip (30.66%)
BabelLanguagePack-modeling.tmf.xtext-zh_4.18.0.v20201226020001.zip (56.38%)
BabelLanguagePack-mylyn-zh_4.18.0.v20201226020001.zip (45.49%)
BabelLanguagePack-rt.rap-zh_4.18.0.v20201226020001.zip (89.22%)
BabelLanguagePack-soa.bpmn2-modeler-zh_4.18.0.v20201226020001.zip (20.25%)
BabelLanguagePack-technology.egit-zh_4.18.0.v20201226020001.zip (21.03%)
BabelLanguagePack-technology.handly-zh_4.18.0.v20201226020001.zip (67.44%)
BabelLanguagePack-technology.jgit-zh_4.18.0.v20201226020001.zip (3.82%)
BabelLanguagePack-technology.lsp4e-zh_4.18.0.v20201226020001.zip (40.54%)
BabelLanguagePack-technology.packaging-zh_4.18.0.v20201226020001.zip (22.4%)
BabelLanguagePack-technology.packaging.mpc-zh_4.18.0.v20201226020001.zip (9.59%)
BabelLanguagePack-technology.passage-zh_4.18.0.v20201226020001.zip (19.35%)
BabelLanguagePack-technology.tm4e-zh_4.18.0.v20201226020001.zip (24.03%)
BabelLanguagePack-tools.cdt-zh_4.18.0.v20201226020001.zip (55.91%)
BabelLanguagePack-tools.gef-zh_4.18.0.v20201226020001.zip (4.92%)
BabelLanguagePack-tools.tracecompass-zh_4.18.0.v20201226020001.zip (20.66%)
BabelLanguagePack-webtools-zh_4.18.0.v20201226020001.zip (68.24%)

步骤二、解压


将features和plugins解压到dropins目录，并重新打开eclipse。

方法二：

安装语言包
通过“帮助”>“安装新软件...”打开安装向导。
添加Babel p2存储库：https://download.eclipse.org/technology/babel/update-site/R0.18.2/2020-12/
选择/安装您选择的语言包
重新启动Eclipse，获得翻译的Eclipse使用语言包
如果您的操作系统的系统语言环境已经是您要用来启动Eclipse的语言，那么您所要做的就是正常启动Eclipse，并且将加载语言包。

如果系统语言环境为英语，并且您想以另一种语言启动Eclipse，则必须使用-nl命令行参数来启动Eclipse ：

eclipse.exe -nl fr
用您要使用的语言环境替换fr。有关更多详细信息，请参见“运行Eclipse”。另请参阅“教您的Eclipse讲本地语言”的Eclipse Corner文章，以获取更多有关如何以不同的语言（包括双向语言，如阿拉伯语）和不同的操作系统（如Linux和Mac OS X）启动Eclipse的更多示例。

entry.title: aria2c 添加 BT-Tracker
entry.content:
vim aria.sh

#!/bin/bash
tracker=`curl -s -k https://ngosang.github.io/trackerslist/trackers_best.txt  |awk NF|sed ":a;N;s/\n/,/g;b a"`
#echo $tracker
aria2c $* --bt-tracker=$tracker

chmod +x aria.sh

Usage: ./aria.sh [OPTIONS] [URI | MAGNET | TORRENT_FILE | METALINK_FILE]...

entry.title: 关于
entry.content:
欢迎来到我的小站呀，很高兴遇见你！🤝

🏠 关于本站
